sections.heading: CONTRADICTORY PROBATE OF TESTAMENTSArt
sections.text: 2901. Contradictory trial required; time to file oppositionIf an objection is made to the ex parte probate of a testament, as provided in Article 2882, the testament may be probated only at a contradictory trial of the matter.Acts 2025, No. 34, ยง1.
